Animal Tracking

an app to assist in tracking of fostered cats & dogs and adoptions

While volunteering and fostering with an Animal Resucue in Las Vegas, it became evident that their use of paper and google spreadsheets to manage data was not ideal. I worked through some of the requirements to generate a design option, but I didnâ€™t have the chance to implement it prior to moving away.
